meanings.definition: A series of fencing maneuvers or attacks
meanings.sent1: During the match, the fencer executed precise passades to outmaneuver the opponent.
meanings.sent2: The fencing instructor demonstrated various passades to the students in the class.
meanings.sent3: The passades in the duel were so quick that it looked like a dance of swords.
meanings.sent4: Her strategic passades in the fencing bout were like a carefully choreographed performance.
meanings.sent5: The passades in the fencing routine were etched in the minds of the spectators.

meanings.definition: A sudden or unexpected action or movement
meanings.sent1: The cat's passades startled the birds perched on the fence.
meanings.sent2: His passades in the game caught everyone by surprise.
meanings.sent3: The passades of the squirrel as it leaped from tree to tree were quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: The passades of the dancer on stage were like bursts of energy.
meanings.sent5: The passades of the wind through the leaves created a rustling sound.
